overview:
Benjamin co-founded FittingBox in 2006, with the ambition of making FittingBox the world leader in virtual try-on solutions for the eyewear industry.

He is responsible for developing the companyâ€™s new products and activities which are to become tomorrowâ€™s growth areas. From April 2011, heâ€™s the CEO of FittingBox.

In the context of FittingBox, Benjamin created in 2006 a consumer internet portal: AlloLunettes.com . Entirely sight and optical dedicated, the website brings together customers and optical professionals.

During summer 2008, Benjamin also took part with other investors in a new company, Alessandro 13 13, raising funds up to 450 000â‚¬. The company creates the website www.enjoysunglasses.com to sell online sunglasses, integrating the FittingBox virtual try on solutions: fit-photo (a web module that enables the web visitors to try on the frames on their own pictures) and fit-live (an application that allows virtual 3D glasses to be tried in real time with the use of a webcam). In 2010, enjoysunglasses becomes a marketplace where e-tailers can propose their own frames.

Prior to FittingBox and Alessandro 13 13, Benjamin worked at Lâ€™OrÃ©al within the Interactive Marketing Department, where he was responsible for overseeing the creation of global websites, implementing innovative diagnostic tools and working on next-generation morphing softwares.

He has developed extensive theoretical and practical knowledge of the web and of associated business models.

Benjamin holds a MS in Marketing from HEC Paris. He also serves as key speaker to company creations at the IEP Paris and at the Petit Poucet competition.
